infobox.Japanese title:: ピエロからの写真メール  (Piero Kara no Shashin Mēru)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Miwako Sato  Kazunobu Chiba  Tsujimura
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Kumiko Shishido (sub-character)  Yuichi Kurosawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Atsuko Yuya as Miwako Sato  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Takuma Suzuki as Tsujimura  Masami Kikuchi as Minoru Kijima  Otoya Kawano as Jiro Ishikawa  Yumi Hikita as Yoko Nakamura  Naoki Imamura as Masatake Shimizu  Naoki Makishima as Clothing store clerk

sections.Situation: Kogoro and Conan are checking out costumes for Kogoro's one day of being a chief firemen. Later they meet people attending a costume party. While walking home, they find a police car in front of the house and meet the people from the costume shop earlier, realizing the host has been murdered.

sections.Trivia: - When Kogoro mentioned that five years ago, you could find a pay phone almost everywhere, and now, they are almost impossible to find. This is interesting, due to five years ago, Conan used the pay phone more than a regular phone, when not using the Earring Cellphone, and at this time, he is using cellphones practically all the time, and no longer uses the earring cellphone.
